Text: does anyone know if there is a crack for the updated version of badder adder?

I was wondering the same thing as well.

It looks like myspace has made some updates, that prevent a few featuers in badder adder 2.0...but the new version appears to have fixed these problems.

yea thats the problem with getting cracked versions of these adders, they have to update a lot to stay current with myspace's bulletin updates and captcha updates. I review all these kind of programs over @ http://www.botreviewer.com and yea, its a pain to update these progs even if you have legit versions.
This version has been discontinued and will not work.
